articles.title: Fact Sheet: President Donald J. Trump Designates Fentanyl as a Weapon of Mass Destruction - The White House (.gov)
articles.description: DEFENDING AMERICA FROM A CHEMICAL WEAPON: Today, President Donald J. Trump signed an Executive Order designating illicit fentanyl and its core precursor
articles.content: DEFENDING AMERICA FROM A CHEMICAL WEAPON: Today, President Donald J. Trump signed an Executive Order designating illicit fentanyl and its core precursor chemical as weapons of mass destruction (WMD).… [+3478 chars]
